entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 7:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
